author: Simon Difford
description: Light and delicate, and not overly citrusy so allowing the rum to shine. And it's sugar-free! At least it is if you choose your rum carefully.
name: Daiquiri (no added sugar & low-calorie)
recipeIngredient: 50 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
